nodes.title: First Semester Reality
nodes.story: Your high school sweetheart is at UCT, you're at Wits. Three months in, the Facetime calls get shorter. 'Sorry, res wifi is trash,' they say at 1 AM. Their Snap location shows them at Roxy's Bar. Your resmate says, 'Bruh, everyone hooks up in first year. It's varsity law.'

choices.text: Book a bus to Cape Town this weekend
Go to a res party yourself

nodes.title: Surprise Visit Disaster
nodes.story: You arrive at their res in Rondebosch. Their roommate looks shocked. 'They're at a beach braai with... friends.' You find them at Camps Bay, shirtless, playing beer pong with someone's arm around them. 'Baby! What a surprise!' they slur. The 'friend' kisses their neck. 'Oops, habit!'

nodes.title: Revenge Hookup Spiral
nodes.story: You take shots with a cute commerce student from Stellenbosch. 'My boyfriend cheated,' you slur. 'Mine too!' They kiss you. Photos surface on Yik Yak: 'Wits vs UCT drama at Camps Bay!' Your partner tries to apologize. You're in a stranger's Airbnb, doing lines of coke off a textbook.

choices.text: Go home, get an STI test
Continue the bender for the weekend

nodes.title: Academic Freefall
nodes.story: You miss three weeks of classes. Your parents get a call from the faculty. You're put on academic probation. The commerce student ghosts you. Your ex transfers to Wits 'to make things right.' You see them holding hands with someone at Neelsie Student Centre. Your life is a meme.

choices.endingText: You work at your uncle's spaza shop. Your ex graduates, tags you in a 'look how far we've come' post. You develop a healthy TikTok addiction.

nodes.title: Mature Resolution
nodes.story: You have the talk on the beach. 'Varsity changes people,' they admit. You both cry. Agree to open the relationship or break up. Choose open. Set rules: protection always, no mutual friends, monthly check-ins. It's messy but honest.

nodes.title: Polyamory on Campus
nodes.story: You hook up with your statistics tutor. They date their rugby teammate. Jealousy flares during exam season. 'You spent study week with them!' fights over WhatsApp. But the sex is incredible after make-up fights. Your friends call you 'progressive' but whisper 'messy.'

choices.endingText: You graduate with a 2:2 and a complicated love life. Your open relationship lasts until graduation, then fades with distance. No regrets, just stories.
